standard.description: Default baseline: governance + plans + docs templates + monorepo scaffolding + optional security/deploy templates (opt-in by vars).

enterprise.description: Enterprise default: enable baseline security and deployment toggles by default (still requires project-specific deploy hook implementation).

backend.description: Backend-first: omit frontend app scaffolding and frontend-specific standards docs.

frontend.description: Frontend-first: omit backend app scaffolding and backend-specific standards docs.

library.description: Library/package repo: omit app scaffolding and app-specific standards docs.

docs.description: Docs-only: omit app and package scaffolding.
